Amazing game, gave me flashbacks from when I was 12ish and I actually completed the by myself, I came back to Portal 2 and I needed help from the Wiki 20% of the time, but I still love the puzzles, the story about GLaDOS and the Facility, and playing the game and exploring the secrets/dens of Ratman.

Amazing game one of a kind and I would recommend it to all, Portal 2 was and now receives the title again for my favourite game of all time. 
Plus it gets points for Nostalgia.

10/10 would and I am gonna play again.

WARNING! PC Breaking bug on this game. YOU MUST READ THIS!

I love this game to bits, however there is a really serious bug with this game in the testing initiative where you build your own test chambers. One of the most serious I’ve known on a PC game. Make sure to read this whole comment.

I was building a complex test chamber in the perpetual testing initiative mode when my PC completely crashed, I was forced to shut it down manually and on rebooting, Windows would not start up again. After taking my PC to a repair shop, I was absolutely shocked to the core, to find that the 3TB hard drive had been destroyed as well as another hard drive on the PC! I had to have windows 10 completely reinstalled, lost years of data and had to reinstall all my programmes again, some of which required repurchases of the software. To this day, my computer has been affected by random graphics card crashes where my screen just dies randomly and my PC now requires multiple power up attempts to boot properly, sometimes more than 3 times to fire up the OS and occasionally, I wonder whether it will boot up at all.

To this day, I’ve never touched this game again or dared to download it, but while I did have it installed, it was great fun and being able to play other peoples test chambers was really cool stuff. The danger is that Valve did not install a safety net for how complex or how many geometric structures your test chamber can have. Yes, there is one for objects, but NOT geometrics such as walls, floors and ceilings. PLEASE be carefully when building test chambers not to over complex the shape of geometry of the chamber and as soon as you lose frame rates, YOU MUST STOP and trim down your test chamber.
此游戏适合有朋友的人玩

即使到现在我也认为传送门系列是本世纪最优秀的游戏
在评论别的游戏时我会对剧情文本、关卡设计、音乐美术等等各种方面谈个不停，但对传送门系列我这么多年评价都只有一句
“前无古人，后无来者，空前绝后的世纪神作”
Much better than expected. The humor is great at every turn. Some tes chambers go by so easy and others will make you step away and wonder for ages what you are not seeing.
Definetly longer and improved than the first game
玩这个有种做数学题的感觉。看看条件（我在哪。我有什么，我能在哪放传送门），看看结论（出口在哪），剩下的就是穷举（笑）。

Mi primer juego de puzzles, fantástico! Lo recomiendo tanto para los que no tienen experiencia con videojuegos de puzzles, como también a los experimentados. Ademas su buena trama es lo que te da ganas de continuar avanzando en el juego, por mas difícil que sea cada puzzle.
un buen juego con una buena historia y cooperativo
sick game and personal favorite valve game
the story is pretty good so far

In my Opinion, Portal 2 is an improvement from the Original Portal. While has the same mechanics from the last installment, it introduces new ones like gel that affects your movements and anti-gravity tunnels. Portal 2 also has more characters and a more complex story than it's predessor. Addtionally, I think the game has more of a personality, Portal 2 has its own unquie menus and interfaces. Overall, I would say that Portal 2 is worth its price (even though Valve doesn't need the money from it. However, there is just one small con. IT HAS FUCKING MICROTRANSACTIONS. Seroiusly, Valve why did you put microtransactions in this nearly flawless game. WHY? Anyways,reader, just ignore them please.
Buenardo, no me podria haber gastado mejor la plata de la beca.
This is a must have. The story is fun and exciting to play through, I would recomend this to anyone even if theyre bad at puzzles.

This game is just. Perfect. I finished it recently, and it left me needing more. This is definitely the best game i have finished. If steam had a super yes system i would use it only for this game. The mapping community around it is also great since it provided me with all the content i would ever want. It saddens me that portal 3 will most likely never be a thing.
